item.title: What's New in vSphere 6.5
item.description: Today at VMworld Europe 2016, vSphere 6.5 is announced. Update: November 15, 2016 vSphere 6.5 is GA. In this blog we highlight some major feature announcements on the following products and technologies: vCenter Server Appliance (VCSA) Virtual SAN (VSAN) Host Profiles Auto Deploy vSphere Security vSphere Fault Tolerance (FT) vSphere DRS Storage IO Control (SIOC): Content Library vSphere Operations Management vRealize Log Insight PowerCLI Here is an overview of the new feature highlights in vSphere 6.
